channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping from traveller camp, 26th June
item.description:
A large number of full bin liners and a large box have been left by the travellers on the green by the roundabout at the bottom of the B1335 Aveley bypass and Stifford Road

item.title: Gentleman been lying on the pavement for 3 days, apparently asleep, 26th June
item.description:
He's soiled himself, and the pavement. He's in danger from this hot weather, especially as he's got layers of clothes on. He's not in a good way and needs help.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dynevor Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vandalised car has been left abandoned in a private car park. It is not taxed or SON, 26th June
item.description:
Vandalised car has been left abandoned in a private car park. It is not taxed or SON. It is not taxed or SORN. There's broken glass everywhere, it's been left there for 6 months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wycherley Close, East Greenwich, London

item.title: Overgrown tree, 26th June
item.description:
Back of 1 Kent Avenue , as you travel down Yorkland Avenue the first alley way on the left and the trees on right have over grown – people cannot access garages and the electricity board are unable to access substation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kent Avenue, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car blocking pavement on Chislehurst Road, 26th June
item.description:
A vehicle with an occupant has been blocking the pavement on Chislehurst Road near the Bickley Arms and Costcutter since Wednesday morning (25 June). There is a pile of rubbish accumulating outside the vehicle. The vehicle is blocking pedestrians, including school groups walking between Chislehurst station and Chislehurst Caves.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Camden, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 26th June
item.description:
Fly tipping on Oakhampton Crescent bus shelter 5 yards from the roundabout that joins King Harold and Brampton Road – 4 black sacks & building waste behind
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Okehampton Crescent, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Is this tall lime tree in a dangerous state?, 26th June
item.description:
Earlier today a large branch from a lime tree immediately outside our property (Brooklyn Cottage) fell across pavement into the road, damaging a parked car. The branch has been dealt with by Bromley's emergency team. Please could the tree be inspected urgently for its state of health - is it in a dangerous?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sydenham Avenue, Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds and creepers overgrown on footpath, 26th June
item.description:
This has been an ongoing problem and was last cleared a year ago! The weeds and all the growth make it impossible for any of us living in middle part of Oldfield road to arrange access for gardening/tree surgeon work and new fences to be done. .. the weeds encroach into our gardens under decking etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oldfield Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
